lexUnit.name: tingle.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: experience a slight stinging sensation

sentence.text: I feel excited and I tingle everywhere .
` Absolutely , " said Jean , whose lips and fingers tingled slightly at the opportunity to say as much .
The blood of my forefathers , all men of the sea … tingled at the very thought . ”
When he tucked in strands of dark curly hair her skin tingled at his touch .
He sat forward and placed his hand on the pad , his palm still tingling from the effects of the shock .
` I 'm still tingling from head to toe . "
Her hand rose to her lips , soft and still tingling from the hard pressure of his possessive mouth .
Ronni could feel her skin tingle from her scalp to her toes .
Berdichev shivered but stood straighter , his skin still tingling from the shower .
His cheeks still tingled with the woody-scented aftershave lotion he had slapped on them .
Vologsky was alert immediately , the tensions now on the surface , his nerve-endings tingling with anticipation and fear .
She tingled with excitement , soon she would be with him , she would see his dear face , touch his crisp hair , feel his mouth on hers .
She was tingling with excitement .
I jerked back , tingling with fear , feeling it peel off like a strand of elastoplast .
My face was tingling with fear and I felt in imminent need of a toilet-roll .
The sound of the slap surprises her , she drops her hand , tingling with the force of it .
The day tingles with new hope .
Her head spun and her left arm tingled painfully with pins and needles .
She could feel her skin tingling with delighted response .
Her fingers were tingling with the warm smoothness , and she stood there looking puzzled or undecided , the packet of notes loose in her hand .
Pain flashed like fire from shoulder to finger-tips , and all his shrieking muscles tingled into helplessness .
Liz hid her fists under the table ; her nails were tingling again .
I could n't move my arms or legs , my body tingled all over and I had a terrible splitting headache .
Even the extremities of her limbs were tingling pleasurably , a subdued kind of electricity running through her entire body .
Her left elbow was tingling too and as she felt for it with her right hand she found that the sleeve of her blouse had been torn .
Her foot began to tingle and she shifted her position .
Melanie 's hands tingled but they went on clapping .
He actually tingled where she touched him .
Her skin was tingling and for some reason or other her face felt flushed .
That look had caused her blood to tingle !
Her skin seemed to be tingling .
Her elbow was tingling where he was touching it .
